question: What is TRIGGER 2K23?
answer: A National Level Technical Symposium conducted by Dept. of CSE, RRCE.

question: Who can participate in TRIGGER 2K23?
answer: All university students. If you’re someone who is willing to learn and wants to take a shot at changing the world, no matter what your field is, you definitely belong here.

question: I have never been to a hackathon, what should I do?
answer: Thats completely fine! You’ll have plenty of opportunities to pick the brains of talented students around you. Furthermore, One day is plenty of time to learn something new.

question: How do I register for Hackfest?
answer: Participants have to register for the event online by clicking at the register button when available on the landing section of this website or by on-spot registration and following along.
